channel.title: No-IP issues... I think
channel.description:
I can get into my server, using LocalHost as an IP.
And I have port forwarded. and I created a No-IP address...
and the DUC shows this...
[IMG]http://i43.tinypic.com/2mdp9c3.jpg[/img]
I have created my own client.
I forwarded the port, that my client loads the server with.
But that shouldn't matter, as "I" Cannot get on the server, with my No-IP.
Meaning, there must be an error with that, Because Port forwarding, should have nothing to do with me, at this point, as I can get through my router no matter what.

item.title: No-IP issues... I think
item.dc:creator: @klorox klorox
item.description:
@klorox wrote:

Port forwarded? Also add me on msn if you like, I can probably help you better that way.

[br][br][size=1]Posted on: December 29, 2008, 11:20:04 pm[/size][hr]Anyone got a few words of wisdom for me?

item.title: No-IP issues... I think
item.dc:creator: @klorox klorox
item.description:
@klorox wrote:

Can other people connect to your server using your no-ip? Because sometimes i can’t connect with my external IP but only with my local host ip.

Read full topic
